title: 2010 keystone Hornet 31RLDS Travel Trailer For Sale in Southwest Louisiana - $16,500.00
content:
Very very nice well kept. Sell or trade. NADA suggested retail $18,350 
Rear living camper. Dual slides, queen size bed, double bed in sofa, table also converts to bed. Stand up shower w/ 6 gal hot water tank gas or electric..freezer gas or electric, 16' electric awning, flat screen tv with surround sound and exterior waterproof speakers, outside shower, spare tire, new 12v battery, new inverter,
